interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hygieia + Encapsulated 2% Retinol Cream – Liposomal Anti-Wrinkle Cream for Face, Neck & Body – Fast & Deep Cellular Absorption – Day or Night Cream for Firming, Lifting & Repairing Aging Skin, 4oz
Review Date: 2022/09/11
Store: Hygieia +
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Hygieia +', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'Retinol', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '3.03 x 2.87 x 2.32 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '607469295352', 'Manufacturer': 'Hygieia +'}
Review Text: As I age, I’ve been using more products with retinol.  I do have tretinoin cream prescribed to me  (but it does irritate my face some): So, when I saw this on my Vine feed (free products for honest reviews), I ordered right away.  I’ve been using this cream a few nights a week for the last few months.  I don’t use products with retinol during the day, due to sun exposure (although, this product states it can be used day and night).  I did notice my sunspots to be diminishing after using.  It is moisturizing, too.  The price is steeper than what I normally would pay, but the results are worth it.  Great find and I would definitely order once I’m out.
Review Title: Nice retinol cream
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
[Upgrade] FUGACAL Hair Straightener Brush, 30s Fast Heating, 3 Temp Settings, Anti-Scald Design and 30mins Auto-Off, Bring You Ultra Straight Hair with Natural Shiny Look in Minutes
Fugacal
{'Brand': 'Fugacal', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Hair Type': 'Thick', 'Product Dimensions': '12.2 x 1.8 x 1.7 inches; 1.79 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'FG-HS01', 'Manufacturer': 'Fugacal'}
I am a habitual flat iron user and recently purchased a wet to dry heating tool/comb, but decided to take a chance on this straightening brush steamer: I must say:  I am quite impressed with this apparatus.  It took me a quick second to get in a groove of running it through my hair, but after a few times, it was pretty easy.  The tension/pull is really good and I liked how it left my hair.  My hair feels so smooth and I am pretty satisfied with how my hair turned out (after my first try)...
Really happy with this item

L'ANGE HAIR Argan-Infused Round Brush | Lightweight & Ergonomic Design | 53MM Tourmaline Ceramic Barrel
L'ANGE HAIR
{'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Shape': 'Round', 'Handle Material': 'Ceramic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Package Dimensions': '12.32 x 4.76 x 3.58 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2456', 'UPC': '810108191339'}
I found this round brush to be of high quality and easy to use.  I sometimes suffer from pain in my wrists due to typing often and found that this brush didn’t bother my wrists at all.  I have never used an Argan infused brush and I did feel a difference between this brush and one without Argan:  I did see that my hair felt smoother and less frizzy.  The price point is on the higher end, but I felt the quality was definitely worth it.
Great round brush for blow drying hair

I have been trying products that gives your hair the “textured” look.  I have used regularly during the Summer months and I found  that it did add volume to my hair.  It also doubles as a dry shampoo., as it absorbs oils from your hair.  Lastly, I felt that the aerosol sprayed out the product with a good amount of strength, which is a plus for me.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user's interest has expanded beyond hair styling tools to include skincare products, particularly those with retinol, indicating a growing focus on anti-aging solutions. They continue to appreciate high-quality items that provide noticeable benefits, both in hair care and skincare.

- **Performance Expectations:** The user values multifunctionality across their grooming products. They emphasize quick absorption and effective application in their skincare routine, alongside strong performance in hair styling tools.

- **User Experience:** Ease of use and functional benefits remain key priorities, with a notable interest in products that not only enhance aesthetics but also offer additional benefits, such as moisture and skin repair.

- **Hair Type Consideration:** While focused on thick hair, they are increasingly open to hair solutions suitable for fine and dry hair. This approach may reflect a broader interest in personalized care across different hair types and textures.

- **Desired Outcome:** The user seeks products that deliver visible results, whether in volume and texture for hair or hydration and anti-aging effects for skin.

- **Safety Features:** Continued emphasis on safety and secure application is evident in their grooming routine, reflecting a responsible approach to both hairstyling and skincare.

- **Satisfaction Level:** High satisfaction continues to characterize their product experiences, with an inclination towards investing in premium, multifunctional, and effective solutions across both hair and skincare. 

Overall, the user is evolving towards a holistic grooming regimen that balances performance, comfort, and innovative benefits across hair and skincare products.
